query: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'ai_events' ORDER BY ordinal_position;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user z1MYe7jFi4tpcxq.root --database 58BauMqumccq39DWK8F9Mx --execute SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'ai_events' ORDER BY ordinal_position;
stdout:
column_name	data_type
id	int
name	text

url	varchar
startDate	timestamp
